name: Fenrir D. Sparrow - A Cosmic Mistake
name_original: Fenrir D. Sparrow - A Cosmic Mistake
description:
Fenrir D. Sparrow is your average cosmonaut in the distant future.

One day, while exploring a distant planet, he found ancient alien technology that brought him to the 5th dimension.

That dimension is known to us, humans, as "LYSERGIC MUSIC".

Now he has to make his way to God in order to be a normal three dimensional human being again.

Can you help him?

-HOW TO PLAY:

PRESS THE "<- ->" ARROW KEYS TO MOVE SIDEWAYS

PRESS "P" TO PAUSE

(and that's pretty much it... enjoy the ride!)

-USP GAME JAM 2022

Made by Bruno Stephan & Saulo Alencar.
